filter.label: Wyfiltrowane pozycje

general.description: Ustawiasz tutaj podstawą konfiguracje dla alarmu.

disarm_after_trigger.heading: Disarm after trigger
disarm_after_trigger.description: After trigger time has expired, disarm the alarm instead of returning to armed state.

enable_master.heading: Włącz alarm główny
enable_master.description: Tworzy encję do zarządzania wszystkimi alarami we wzystich obszarach.

modes.title: Tryby
modes.description: This panel can be used to set up the arm modes of the alarm.

modes.armed_away: Armed away will be used when all people left the house. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, as well as motion sensors inside the house.
modes.armed_home: Armed home (also known as armed stay) will be used when setting the alarm while people are in the house. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, but not motion sensors inside the house.
modes.armed_night: Armed night will be used when setting the alarm before going to sleep. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, and selected motion sensors (downstairs) in the house.
modes.armed_vacation: Armed vacation can be used as an extension to the armed away mode in case of absence for longer duration. The delay times and trigger responses can be adapted (as desired) to being distant from home.
modes.armed_custom_bypass: An extra mode for defining your own security perimeter.

status.heading: Status
status.description: Controls whether the alarm can be armed in this mode.

exit_delay.heading: Opóźnienie wyjścia
exit_delay.description: When arming the alarm, within this time period the sensors will not trigger the alarm yet.

entry_delay.heading: Opóźnienie wejścia
entry_delay.description: Delay time until the alarm is triggered after one of the sensors is activated.

trigger_time.heading: Trigger time
trigger_time.description: Time during which the alarm will remain in the triggered state after activation.

mqtt.title: Konfiguracja MQTT
mqtt.description: This panel can be used for configuration of the MQTT interface.

state_topic.heading: State topic
state_topic.description: Topic on which state updates are published

event_topic.heading: Event topic
event_topic.description: Topic on which alarm events are published

command_topic.heading: Command topic
command_topic.description: Topic which Alarmo listens to for arm/disarm commands.

require_code.heading: Require code
require_code.description: Require the code to be sent with the command.

areas.title: Obszary
areas.description: Areas can be used for dividing your alarm system into multiple compartments.
areas.no_items: There are no areas defined yet.

edit_area.title: Edytuj obszar ''{area}''
edit_area.name_warning: Note: changing the name will change the entity ID

remove_area.title: Usunąć obszar?
remove_area.description: Are you sure you want to remove this area? This area contains {sensors} sensors and {automations} automations, which will be removed as well.

disable_master.title: Disable master?
disable_master.description: Are you sure you want to remove the alarm master? This area contains {automations} automations, which will be removed with this action.

sensors.description: Currently configured sensors. Click on an item to make changes.

table.no_items: There are no sensors to be displayed here.
table.no_area_warning: Sensor is not assigned to any area.

add_sensors.title: Dodaj czujniki
add_sensors.description: Add more sensors. Make sure that your sensors have a suitable name, so you can identify them.
add_sensors.no_items: There are no available HA entities that can be configured for the alarm. Make sure to include entities of the type binary_sensor.

area.heading: Obszar
area.description: Select an area which contains this sensor.

group.heading: Grupa
group.description: Group with other sensors for combined triggering.

device_type.heading: Typ urządzenia
device_type.description: Choose a device type to automatically apply appropriate settings.

door.name: Drzwi
door.description: A door, gate or other entrance that is used for entering/leaving the home.

window.name: Okno
window.description: A window, or a door not used for entering the house such as balcony.

motion.name: Ruch
motion.description: Presence sensor or similar device having a delay between activations.

tamper.name: Wstrząsowy
tamper.description: Detector of sensor cover removal, glass break sensor, etc.

environmental.name: Bezpieczeństwa
environmental.description: Smoke/gas sensor, leak detector, etc. (not related to burglar protection).

always_on.heading: Zawsze włączony
always_on.description: Sensor should always trigger the alarm.

modes.heading: Dostępne tryby
modes.description: Alarm modes in which this sensor is active.

arm_on_close.heading: Uzbrój po zamknięciu
arm_on_close.description: After deactivation of this sensor, the remaining exit delay will automatically be skipped.

use_exit_delay.heading: Uzbrój pomimo że aktywny
use_exit_delay.description: Sensor is allowed to be active when the exit delay starts.

use_entry_delay.heading: Use entry delay
use_entry_delay.description: Sensor activation triggers the alarm after the entry delay rather than directly.

allow_open.heading: Aktywny po uzbrojeniu
allow_open.description: If the sensor is still active after the exit delay, this will not cause arming to fail.

auto_bypass.heading: Wyklucz automatycznie
auto_bypass.description: Exclude this sensor from the alarm if it is open while arming.
auto_bypass.modes: Modes in which sensor may be bypassed

trigger_unavailable.heading: Aktywuj kiedy niedostępny
trigger_unavailable.description: When the sensor state becomes 'unavailable', this will activate the sensor.

errors.no_modes: No modes are selected for which the sensor should be active
errors.no_auto_bypass_modes: No modes are selected for the sensor may be automatically bypassed

manage_groups.title: Zarządzaj grupami czujników
manage_groups.description: In a sensor group multiple sensors must be activated within a time period before the alarm is triggered.

timeout.heading: Time-out
timeout.description: Time period during which consecutive sensor activations triggers the alarm.

sensors.heading: Czujnik
sensors.description: Select the sensors which are contained by this group.

errors.insufficient_sensors: At least 2 sensors need to be selected.

code_arm_required.heading: Użyj kodów uzbrojenia
code_arm_required.description: Require a code for arming the alarm

code_disarm_required.heading: Użyj kodów rozbrojenia
code_disarm_required.description: Require a code for disarming the alarm

code_format.heading: Typ kodów
code_format.description: Sets the input type for Lovelace alarm card.

user_management.title: Zarządzanie użytkownikami
user_management.description: Each user has its own code to arm/disarm the alarm.

new_user.title: Utwórz nowego użytkownika
new_user.description: Users can be created for providing access to operating the alarm.

can_arm.heading: Kod może uzbroić
can_arm.description: Entering this code activates the alarm

can_disarm.heading: Kod może rozbroić
can_disarm.description: Entering this code deactivates the alarm

is_override_code.heading: Is override code
is_override_code.description: Entering this code will arm the alarm in force

area_limit.heading: Tylko wybrane obszary
area_limit.description: Limit user to control only the selected areas

old_code.heading: Obecny kod
old_code.description: Current code, leave empty to leave unchanged.

notifications.title: Powiadomienia
notifications.description: Using this panel, you can manage notifications to be sent when a certain alarm event occurs.

table.no_items: There are no notifications created yet.
table.no_area_warning: Action is not assigned to any area.

actions.description: This panel can be used to switch a device when the alarm state changes.

table.no_items: There are no actions created yet.

new_notification.title: Konfiguracja powiadomień
new_notification.description: Receive a notification when arming/disarming the alarm, on activation, etc.

event.heading: Zdarzenie
event.description: When should the notification be sent

untriggered.name: Alarm został zakończony
untriggered.description: The triggered state of the alarm has ended

arm_failure.name: Błąd uzbrojenia alarmu
arm_failure.description: The arming of the alarm failed due to one or more open sensors

arming.name: Opóźnienie wyjścia rozpoczęte
arming.description: Exit delay started, ready to leave the house.

pending.name: Opóźnienie wejścia rozpoczęte
pending.description: Entry delay started, the alarm will trigger soon.

mode.heading: Tryb
mode.description: Limit the action to specific arm modes (optional)

placeholders.untriggered: The alarm is not longer triggered.
placeholders.arm_failure: The alarm could not be armed right now, due to: {{open_sensors}}.
placeholders.arming: The alarm will be armed soon, please leave the house.
placeholders.pending: The alarm is about to trigger, disarm it quickly!

open_sensors_format.heading: Format for open_sensors wildcard
open_sensors_format.description: Choose which sensor information in inserted in the message

arm_mode_format.heading: Translation for arm_mode wildcard
arm_mode_format.description: Choose in which language the arm mode is inserted in the message

target.heading: Urządzenie
target.description: Device to send the notification to

new_action.title: Konfiguracja akcji
new_action.description: Switch lights or devices (such as sirens) when arming/disarming the alarm, on activation, etc.

event.heading: Zdarzenie
event.description: When should the action be executed

area.heading: Obszar
area.description: Area for which the event applies, leave empty to select the global alarm.

mode.heading: Tryb
mode.description: Limit the action to specific arm modes (optional)

action.heading: Akcja
action.description: Action to perform on the entity
action.no_common_actions: Actions can only be assigned in YAML mode for the selected entities.
